Think plastic seats.

Think T.V. in the corner.

Think low prices.

Think grim toilets.

Think run by Chinese people.

This is the Shitty Spanish Bar Chinese Version 2.0 – a type of traditional Shitty Spanish Bar but run by Chinese people. Along with banks and pharmacies these bars are everywhere in Valencia (there are less in the city centre). If it’s not a Shitty Spanish Bar (See above list but remove Chinese people and replace with grumpy Spanish people) then it will likely be a Shitty Spanish Bar Chinese Version 2.0.
